h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Find the Yellow-Robed Squire (Drunken Boar NPC)
content: Smash through the fence and go straight ahead to find the Yellow-Robed Squire on the rock. Unfortunately, you won't get much out of him except for retching and mentions of jars from Windrest until you find a **key itemcalled the Sobering Stone**. There are two ways to get hold of the item, so here's what you need to know.
